feed.title: TubeSync Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for TubeSync: v0.13.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use assertEqual as pluralized doesn't exist by @joestump in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/513
  • Improve skip filtering with regex invert and duration limits by @timwhite in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/515
  • Allow semi easy addition to filtering logic by @timwhite in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/516
  • Docker build caching by @timwhite in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/517
  • Add support for indexing Streams by @FaySmash in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/523

New Contributors

  • @joestump made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/513
  • @timwhite made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/515
  • @FaySmash made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/523

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/compare/v0.13.6...v0.13.7

entry.title: New release for TubeSync: v0.14.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix python version in manage.py by @michalmiddleton in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/537
  • Use YOUTUBE_DL_TEMPDIR setting by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/556
  • Reworked Dockerfile by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/558
  • Remove value from TARGETARCH by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/559
  • Spelled firewall correctly by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/560
  • Configure minimum permitted video height with VIDEO_HEIGHT_CUTOFF env var by @danielmawhirter in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/557
  • Refinements for Dockerfile by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/562
  • Adjust to correct 60 fps case by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/569
  • Accept '-' in sub_langs by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/573
  • Simplify regex for sub_langs by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/574
  • Handle STR0NNN in a generic way by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/571
  • Sort video formats by height and bitrate by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/566
  • Disable checking against days to keep by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/576
  • Add Support for TUBESYNC_DIRECTORY_PREFIX Environment Variable by @jameswlane in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/572
  • Adjust days_to_keep logic by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/577
  • Remove audio / video directory modification by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/578
  • Simplify directory_path by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/579
  • Remove unused timedelta import by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/585
  • Use tempfile for write_text_file by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/587
  • Remove forcejson option by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/589
  • Switch to color option by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/590
  • Use Path in file_is_editable by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/592
  • Bump yt_dlp & ffmpeg by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/607
  • Do not log download progress lines by default by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/600
  • Remove duplicated ' to:' by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/602
  • Cleanup removed media that has not been downloaded too by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/605
  • Made messages more human friendly by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/606
  • Use title from DB by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/604
  • Only log new media by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/601
  • Update ci.yaml by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/597
  • Handle download_media_metadata task failures by @RichardHyde in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/593
  • Ignore case when checking the filter by @RichardHyde in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/594
  • Handle raise_no_formats exception by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/591
  • Fix paths for when filename includes sub-directories by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/599
  • Reduce image size and keep pycache in a volume by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/596
  • Do not try to skip already skipped media by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/595
  • Match another variation of the message by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/610
  • Don't chmod a+r when it already has those permissions by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/611
  • exec nginx so bash isn't still running by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/613
  • Make better use of CPU cache with nginx by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/614
  • Test and log ffmpeg version output earlier by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/615
  • Simplify directory_path for Media by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/618
  • Feature by @Makhuta in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/617
  • Multi-stage docker build for ffmpeg & s6-overlay by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/619
  • Filter metadata to avoid storing excess text in the database table by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/612
  • Dockerfile health check without the shell by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/620
  • Avoid env for healthcheck by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/623
  • Add environment variables for container by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/622
  • Don't write 'None' in default rating by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/626
  • Don't write zero into MPAA in .nfo by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/627
  • Bump ffmpeg & yt-dlp by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/629
  • Cache for pipenv & apt by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/630
  • Update README.md by @FaySmash in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/625
  • Treat static_url the same as other URLs by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/635
  • Create upgrade_yt-dlp.sh by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/628
  • Pipefile -> Pipfile by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/636
  • Update architectures FAQ by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/637
  • Add youtube.com as a valid domain by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/638
  • Automated channel_id extraction by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/640
  • Better display for audio formats by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/643
  • Report db.sqlite3 size on dashboard by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/580
  • Display media we can't download as skipped by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/648
  • Remove unnecessary spaces by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/651
  • DRY {json,nfo,thumb}name functions by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/652
  • Default to valid JSON by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/653
  • Display language_code for audio formats by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/654
  • Set a default nice level by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/656
  • Download thumbnail and media at the same priority by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/650
  • Rename files after a source format change by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/586
  • Use TextChoices for SponsorBlock_Category by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/658
  • Fix CommaSepChoiceField by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/657
  • Use yt_dlp.get_postprocessors() by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/655
  • Use a temporary directory per task by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/659
  • Add ytopts by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/664
  • Use strings for ytopts paths by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/666
  • Fix log.debug() by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/667
  • Fix filesizeformat prefixes by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/644
  • Remove files in post_delete when Media is deleted by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/598
  • Reorganize hooks by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/663
  • Update local_settings.py.container by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/671
  • Configure settings for this test by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/673
  • Simply add the string we want by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/674
  • Adjustments for downloading delays by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/672
  • export TUBESYNC_RESET_DOWNLOAD_DIR by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/679
  • Rework sponsorblock_categories and CommaSepChoiceField by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/680
  • Fix the misspelled expected_categories by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/681
  • Also check for media.media_file.name by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/684
  • Do not store duplicate categories by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/687
  • Wait for video premiere by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/685
  • Turn off the text-transform with a class by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/686
  • Remove code that didn't work by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/688
  • Bump ffmpeg by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/689
  • Do not delete tasks that are currently running by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/665
  • Rework download progress hook by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/691
  • Remove existing (unlocked) tasks is safe to use by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/694
  • Add more keys to filter by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/696
  • Add & use functions from status classes by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/692
  • Use libopus and speed up VP9 encoding by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/697
  • Add status text to the download task by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/706
  • Do not schedule additional download_media tasks by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/707
  • Try to include timestamp by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/704
  • Rename the internal function by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/709
  • Control writethumbnail with embed_thumbnail by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/712
  • Stop when the paths match by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/699
  • Remove subtitles also by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/700
  • Allow exec_cmd dictionary to be configured in settings by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/701
  • Remove unused filter_media by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/702
  • Deduplicated fields by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/710
  • Skip downloaded media that was deleted by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/703
  • We can filter before metadata by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/714
  • Use a raw string by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/715
  • Show publication date and the not truncated title by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/717
  • Find the correct media instance from hooks by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/720
  • Remove logging of the SQL by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/724
  • Handle None in video["duration"] by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/726
  • Move things into choices.py by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/711
  • Do not turn Media.skip off for already skipped media by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/727
  • Let Tasks expire correctly by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/690
  • Schedule a rename task per media item instead by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/730
  • Review of signals.py by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/731
  • Do not show controls when skipped by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/732
  • Unskip when redownloading by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/733
  • Ensure the directory exists for testing by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/735
  • Add metadata_published function by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/737
  • Move import for tz by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/739
  • Load fulltitle from the metadata by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/736
  • Prefer fulltitle but do not require it by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/740
  • Add XDG_CACHE_HOME environment variable by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/743
  • Bump ffmpeg build by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/744
  • Defer fields for rename_media task by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/745
  • Select a combined format if nothing else is available by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/746
  • Add and use refresh_formats by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/747
  • Do not let one private video hold up the rest by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/749
  • Use multiple threads for renaming by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/750
  • Remove duplicate function by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/751
  • Process renaming after downloads by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/752
  • Check for the database vendor first by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/755
  • Log not existing source pre save by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/758
  • Move rename_media task creation to Media post save by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/759
  • Update rename_all_media_for_source by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/760
  • Be more consistent with fmt by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/761
  • Add scheduling delays by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/757
  • Optimize rename_files by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/762
  • Fix an internal server error by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/763
  • Be more efficient with Media.loaded_metadata by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/764
  • Jellyfin media server support by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/756
  • Pin django-background-tasks by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/754
  • Upgrade to 1.2.8 for Django 5 support by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/765
  • Remove Redis by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/766
  • Prevent unintended changes to the cached dictionary by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/767
  • Access posix_epoch correctly by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/769
  • SQLite connection options by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/581
  • Check for the cached dictionary first by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/771
  • Remove unnecessary chmod executions by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/775
  • Store Media.downloaded_filesize for imported files by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/776
  • Prevent unintended unhealthy restarts by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/784
  • CSRF Fixes for Django 5.1 by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/786
  • Use yt-dlp daterange option by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/787
  • Clean up __pycache__ directories by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/792
  • Add pagination for scheduled tasks by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/790
  • Better display of large numbers by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/793
  • Do not lose track of downloaded files by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/794
  • Be more user-friendly when sorting tasks by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/795
  • Restrict PYTHONPYCACHEPREFIX to pipenv by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/796
  • Rename to a temporary path then final destination by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/799
  • Fail tasks when metadata can't be fetched by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/801
  • Display task errors from the current page by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/802
  • Verify nginx configuration for the image by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/804
  • Long web requests by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/803
  • Bump ffmpeg by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/806
  • No more errors for None values set in metadata by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/807
  • Name the buildx step by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/809
  • Set Media.download_date for imported files by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/800
  • Removed extra characters by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/810
  • Fix 2160 resolution label by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/812
  • Filter latest downloads with download_date IS NOT NULL by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/814
  • Remove useless duplicated assignment by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/815
  • Disable proxies for health checking by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/816
  • Do not try to refresh formats when no metadata exists by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/819
  • Update 0028_alter_source_source_resolution.py by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/822
  • Increase database efficiency by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/824
  • Improve checking media efficiency by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/826
  • Speed up arm64 builds by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/808
  • Remove explicit libsass by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/828
  • Remove explicit django-compressor by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/829
  • Use socks support from the operating system by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/830
  • Reorder checking all media to after indexing by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/832
  • Check the copied nginx configuration by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/835
  • docs: update README.md by @eltociear in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/836
  • Use '/downloads' instead of '/' for odd cases by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/838
  • Increase episode number calculation speed by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/839
  • Better environment variable support for settings by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/821
  • Patch yt-dlp to use check_thumbnails by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/818
  • Add timing and profiling decorators by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/827
  • Improve deleting sources by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/842
  • Clean up more tasks for deleted sources by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/844
  • Add geo_verification_proxy to default yt-dlp settings by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/845
  • More Docker cache hits by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/846
  • Use the curl-cffi extra to support impersonate option by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/847
  • Base request delay on the number of tasks running by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/851
  • Prevent filename from beginning with / by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/853
  • Create fatal_http_errors.py patch by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/852
  • Upgrade psycopg by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/854
  • Reduce the amount of time the database is locked by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/855
  • Reschedule download tasks when metadata is not ready by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/856
  • Delete pip.conf by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/831
  • Use the specific NoMetadataException by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/857
  • Better indexing of inactive sources by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/860
  • Add a default thumbnail URL before metadata is available by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/864
  • Show progress on tasks page by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/833
  • fixup: indentation by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/866
  • Thumbnail download can proceed without metadata by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/865
  • The workflow should work for forks also by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/859
  • Be consistent with the tuple syntax by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/867
  • Use Media.metadata_published in reduce_data by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/868
  • More stable ffmpeg releases by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/870
  • Refresh formats only after metadata was saved by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/850
  • Tweak tasks page by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/823
  • Apply the suggested "Sync Now" changes by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/841
  • Tweak name to be accurate again by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/872
  • Clean verbose_name when a repeating task did not complete by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/874
  • Add and use the update_task_status function by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/875
  • Add the video number to the debug log message by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/876
  • Don't skip missing fragments during format testing by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/877
  • Use locked_at as it is closer to started by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/878
  • Resume partial downloads unless the .clean file is found by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/879
  • Change the task expiration to 1 day by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/880
  • Configure logging for background_task by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/881
  • fixup: missed self. by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/883
  • fixup: use the class instead of an instance by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/884
  • Remove the hard-coded class name by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/885
  • Force new yt-dlp version by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/886
  • Turn off the info step again for pull requests by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/890
  • Move yt-dlp API work to an action by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/889
  • Turn off debugging for the lowercase-variables step by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/891
  • Add the string-case action by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/892
  • Tweak the step name by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/894
  • Clean up the .json file and log the results by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/896
  • Start a library of useful functions for actions and workflows by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/895
  • Handle strings better by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/898
  • Clean up debug logs from process_tasks by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/899
  • Adjust to the much larger MAX_RUN_TIME by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/901
  • Don't skip unavailable fragments during download by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/903
  • Create down-signal for tubesync-worker by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/906
  • Switch to an allowed signal by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/907
  • Add a post-processor to disallow partial playlist results by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/905
  • Add extractor so that id cannot collide by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/910
  • Use list.append instead of list.extend by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/914
  • Run the check source directory task before saving existing sources by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/916
  • Add dive analysis by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/915
  • Log more details about what pipenv installs by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/918
  • Avoid Django 5.2 until it is tested by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/919
  • Clean up old debconf cache files by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/922
  • Close the ThreadPool before exiting by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/923
  • Set priority in tasks.py by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/920
  • Allow AV1 as a choice by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/753
  • Rework task queuing by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/925
  • Create 0030_alter_source_source_vcodec.py by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/929
  • Use a task per instance for Media.refresh_formats by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/930
  • Restrict delays to a range between 10 seconds and 20 minutes by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/911
  • Fix video format sorting in case of missing keys by @danielmawhirter in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/931
  • Set verbose_name for refesh_formats task by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/932
  • Switch to getattr by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/934
  • Add renaming feature warning to the dashboard by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/936
  • Extract audio from webm downloads by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/937
  • Remove unused media_post_delete by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/939
  • Check source directory when tasks were reset by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/940
  • Increase minor version by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/942

New Contributors

  • @michalmiddleton made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/537
  • @tcely made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/556
  • @danielmawhirter made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/557
  • @jameswlane made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/572
  • @RichardHyde made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/593
  • @Makhuta made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/617
  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/836

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/compare/v0.13.7...v0.14.1

entry.title: New release for TubeSync: v0.15.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • POST to /Items/{ID}/Refresh by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/946
  • Import the check_source_directory_exists task by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/947
  • Refactor make_request by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/948
  • Transactions are tricky for deleting sources by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/861
  • Update README.md by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/952
  • Remove BACKGROUND_TASK_ASYNC_THREADS adjustment by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/953
  • Try refresh_formats for NoFormatException by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/956
  • Fix the can_download calculation code by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/958
  • New models for metadata and formats by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/954
  • Create restart_services.sh by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/951
  • Adjust queue workers by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/933
  • Add file renaming warning to README.md by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/935
  • Do not call resize_image_to_height on smaller images by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/957
  • Create the django_queryset_generator function by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/959
  • Support use_chunked_fetch with django_queryset_generator by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/963
  • Fix dumpdata output by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/965
  • Update README.md by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/967
  • Adjust the relative link in README.md by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/969
  • Special case sqlite for database locking by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/944
  • Add /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/docker-disable-pkgcache by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/971
  • Use Media.has_metadata in Media.save function by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/973
  • Remove extra white-space by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/975
  • Squash old migrations for sync by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/976
  • Rewrite warning in README.md by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/977
  • Update dependency in 0031_metadata_metadataformat.py by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/978
  • Restore some of the individual migration files by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/981
  • Indentation for models.py by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/982
  • Add a post processor for after move by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/984
  • Use the default locale before the new one is ready by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/985
  • Squashed earlier migrations by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/987
  • Restore all the individual files by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/989
  • Expand resolution matching to include height by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/991
  • Start using the new metadata models by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/968
  • Use the actual model for data migration by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/992
  • Ignore KeyError when deleting keys by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/993
  • Remove the side-effect from Media.metadata_loads by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/994
  • Better result when Media.new_metadata does not exist by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/995
  • Use the length of the new metadata by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/996
  • Add redownload thumb link by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/998
  • Fix media-thumb-redownload errors by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/999
  • Overwrite thumbnail files by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1000
  • Do not cache the blank thumbnail for so long by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1001
  • Save thumbnail when refreshing formats by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1002
  • Adjust metadata & media download delays by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1003
  • Include missing_pot formats in testing by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1004
  • Replace nginx with openresty by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1006
  • Copy updated thumbnail next to media by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1007
  • Handle AssertionError for timestamp by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1008
  • Show migrations when debugging by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1009
  • Add NoThumbnailException by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1010
  • Created fix-mariadb.py by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1013
  • Add more details about saving database entries by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1016
  • Remux video for combined format download by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1021
  • Use POSTGRES_DB instead of init.sql by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1022
  • Stop services before database steps by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1023
  • Add music.youtube.com to the YouTube domains by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1025
  • Add a missing error message by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1027
  • Add a start link to scheduled tasks by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1026
  • Log OSError when checking for existing media files by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1029
  • Create a media entry after deletion by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1031
  • Let missing_pot formats download after testing by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1017
  • Use a widget to select when in the browser by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1032
  • Refactor models by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1030
  • Clean up extra metadata rows by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1033

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/compare/v0.14.1...v0.15.1

entry.title: New release for TubeSync: v0.15.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use Django 5.2 by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1036
  • Update release.yaml by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1039
  • Migrate task logic to models by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1040
  • Add Proof-of-Origin Token plugin framework by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1005
  • Do not upgrade to Django 5.3 automatically by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1043
  • Add a step for ruff check by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1041
  • Remove the unused getpot_bgutil_script plugin by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1045
  • Improve Source.index_media function by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1044
  • Wait for HTTP 429 errors by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1046
  • Downloading media fixes by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1048
  • Fixes for ruff check output by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1042
  • Tweaks for recent changes by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1049
  • Log more human-friendly output by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1050
  • Close the tr tag on the next line by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1053
  • Renaming was removing too many extensions by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1054
  • Fail when ruff finds errors by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1055
  • Tighten errors_qs by checking last_error by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1056
  • yt-dlp-get-pot was recently superceded by a framework in yt-dlp by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1057
  • Create a release by @tcely in https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/pull/1058

Full Changelog: https://github.com/meeb/tubesync/compare/v0.15.1...v0.15.4
